title: Venezuela's oil will start 'flowing' to companies, Trump says after attack
shortDescription: 'We're going to get the oil flowing the way it should be,' President Donald Trump said after the U.S. captured Venezuelan President Nicolaﾌ《 Maduro.

title: Trump says US will run Venezuela and rebuild oil
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the U.S. will oversee Venezuela and invest billions to restore its oil industry.

title: America First? What Trump's startling arrest of Maduro tells us.
shortDescription: President Trump hasn't withdrawn from the world. He increasingly asserts U.S. interests by rhetoric and force.

title: Trump: US will 'run' Venezuela temporarily and rebuild oil industry
shortDescription: Trump said the U.S. will run Venezuela until a new government can be put in place and that the country's oil industry would cover the costs to rebuild.

title: Trump gives details on Maduro capture
shortDescription: At a press conference, President Donald Trump gave details of the U.S. military operation that seized Nicolaﾌ《 Maduro and wife in Caracas overnight.

title: Trump releases first image of Maduro in US custody
shortDescription: Trump shared the picture of Maduro in U.S. custody in a social media post on Jan. 3.

title: See President Trump address the nation after US strikes on Venezuela
shortDescription: See President Donald Trump address the nation after the U.S. struck Venezuela and captured the South American country's leader, Nicolaﾌ《 Maduro.

title: Republicans rally behind Trump's Venezuela strikes: 'Face justice'
shortDescription: While congressional Republicans applauded Trump's actions as a new day in Latin America, Democrats questioned repercussions by foreign adversaries.

title: Watch full video: Trump holds news conference after US captures Maduro
shortDescription: Trump gave more details about the overnight operation in Venezuela and announced the United States will "run" the country for the time being.

title: US conducted strike on Venezuela, captured Maduro, Trump says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump confirmed the U.S. was behind the strike several hours after explosions shook Venezuela's capital city of Caracas.

title: Trump says US will 'run' Venezuela after capturing Maduro
shortDescription: Trump said Venezuelan leader Nicolaﾌ《 Maduro and his wife were "captured and flown out of the Country."

title: Trump stops motorcade to shop for White House ballroom marble
shortDescription: Two days into 2026, President Trump and his motorcade made a surprise pit stop to find just the right marble for his White House ballroom.
